short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts the number of images on the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a quick and easy way to count the number of images on any webpage. Perfect for content creators, web developers, and designers, it allows users to instantly see the total image count on the current page without any manual effort. Simply click the extension icon, and it will display the number of images in the post or webpage, helping you manage media-rich content with ease.
